title: Zigzag Conversion
prompt: The string "PAYPALISHIRING" is written in a zigzag pattern on a given number of rows. Read the string line by line and return the converted string.
constraints: s consists of English letters (lower-case and upper-case), ',' and '.'.
hints: Visualize how characters are arranged in rows. Characters move down, then up, then down again.
Track which row each character belongs to. The direction changes when you hit row 0 or row numRows-1.
Use a string array to represent each row. Append characters to the appropriate row as you traverse the string.
The pattern repeats every (2 * numRows - 2) characters for the vertical sections.
